divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down to my freinds race car shop , with is a 1.5 miles from my house,As i was driving something flew over me very close and very fast, it suprise me so much i hit the brakes,the red lights lite up the hood of my truck ,it made no noise and moving very very fast it took just seconds and all i could see was the red lights, It was heading NE and turn E and turn S and slow down to a crawl,I watch it as it was flying right over I69 very slow appox. 150 feet above ,It took about 10 mins and i lost site of it in the tree line. In the last year i have seen many things in sky at night close to my home, bright color lights, ect.I don't know want what all going on,or if the army is flying things out of ft. custer in this area....
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tekonsha
This sighting has never been favorited.
